name: FarmLax
description:
Controls

[WASD] Move Camera
[1 2 3 4 5] Select Card in Hand
[Tab] Switch to Deletion Mode (once per Turn)

Hover over any Card to see where the Plant would like to be placed!

____________________________________________________________________________

Credits

[Code] Nyuuh & S1lencePlease
[Sprites] Takooki
[Font] fibberish, via https://caffinate.itch.io/fibberish
[Background Music] "relaxation music #13", by ShortRecord via freesound.org
[Ambient Noise] "Outside Atmos at Night", by Jeanet_Henning via freesound.org
[Card Sound] "Taking Card", by dersuperanton via freesound.org
